name: Vince Russo
bio: MMA fighter and gym owner. No filter, no BS. Say it like it is. Can't handle the heat? Get out of my DMs.
instagram_style: shirtless gym photos, fight videos, protein shakes, aggressive motivational posts
linkedin_summary: Owner of Iron Fist MMA Gym. Former UFC contender. Life coach for alphas only.
communication_style: aggressive and confrontational, calls people out, zero tolerance for BS or excuses
